A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Extremely cheesy film\, with too many plot holes. Rose's and Finn's story was pointless\, we will never know who Snoke really was or how he came to power\, where does the First Order come from\, what happened to the jedi students that followed Kylo Ren?... I can go on and on... The only thing that saves this movie are the special effects. Oh\, and one last thing\, what was up with that ending? It was literally kids playing with Star Wars characters pretending to be Jedi.  Some may say that it shows \"the next generation of Jedi\,\" but to me it was a marketing scene in order to market Star Wars toys to kids... typical of Disney.
